  index: "portuguese_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      filter: {
        portuguese_stop: {
          type: "stop",
          stopwords: "_portuguese_",
        },
        portuguese_keywords: {
          type: "keyword_marker",
          keywords: ["exemplo"],
        },
        portuguese_stemmer: {
          type: "stemmer",
          language: "light_portuguese",
        },
      },
      analyzer: {
        rebuilt_portuguese: {
          tokenizer: "standard",
          filter: [
            "lowercase",
            "portuguese_stop",
            "portuguese_keywords",
            "portuguese_stemmer",
          ],
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
